attributes.action: cause an open equality throughout the theatrical world leading to equal pay, equal respect and equal hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The biggest voice we have is BECTU, our union, and I feel that it is time that we too are respected. Technicians work all hours under the sun and moon with little time off, actors are frowned upon yet are there to entertain the frowners, office staff are expected to cause a sell out on every show but this cannot always be done and for gay people to be respected and accepted throughout this industry and the public. Equal pay is needed, minimum wage must be met, equal hours so that everybody can have a chance for a decent nights sleep and to see their family...
